Zero Fucks Countdown – 2017 - The news has been terrible this year. So to cheer myself up throughout it, I’ve been saving a bunch of links and screenshots of the animals and people who stopped giving a shit in very public ways. Here’s what made my cut... https://t.co/jZ5VlzQc3f
It only took a year plus but I finally wrote in my blog. Here is my Zero Fucks Countdown of 2017. https://t.co/10nXPkzNoI

I say this as someone who loves old sitcoms:
STOP REVIVING OLD SITCOMS.
OR IF YOU'RE GOING TO INSIST ON REVIVING THEM, BRING BACK "NIGHT COURT" OR GTFO/end rant

(how skeleton sounds) Friend: What if we had a water slide in the olympics? Me: That sounds cool! F: Covered in ice! Me: Well I guess if it's during Summ-- F: In winter Me: Wait what? F: Don't worry you'll get a helmet M: OK well that's reassuri-- F: Ur going headfirst M: Jesus

Here's a thought: Teachers are not obligated to save your kid's life.
They do it anyway, but they aren't.
And if you think they are, then you better start bringing a lot less attitude to these parent-teacher conferences and a lot more cupcakes.
